remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析的日期字串表示符合任何一個模式指派給`formats`陣列。The method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` array. 如果`input`字串不符合任何一個這些模式所定義的任何變化`styles`參數，剖析作業失敗，而且此方法會傳回`false`。If the `input` string does not match any one of these patterns with any variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the parsing operation fails and the method returns `false`. 除了比較`input`到多個字串，包含格式規範，這個多載的行為相同方法。Aside from comparing `input` to multiple strings that contain format specifiers, this overload behaves identically to the method. `formats`參數是字串陣列，其項目包含單一標準格式規範或定義的可能模式的一或多個自訂格式規範`input`。The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements contain either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the possible pattern of `input`. 如需有效的格式化程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)並[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果中的相符項目`formats`包含`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自訂格式規範，以指出位移必須存在於`input`，該時差必須包含負號或正號。If the matched element in `formats` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果正負號遺漏，剖析作業失敗，而且此方法會傳回`false`。If the sign is missing, the parse operation fails and the method returns `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用`formats`的這個多載來指定多個格式的參數可協助降低進入日期和時間時，許多使用者體驗的挫折。Using the `formats` parameter of this overload to specify multiple formats can help reduce the frustration many users experience when they enter dates and times. 特別是，能夠定義多個輸入的模式可讓應用程式來處理可以包含或缺少的幾個月、 天、 小時、 分鐘和秒的前置零的日期和時間表示。In particular, the ability to define multiple input patterns enables an application to handle date and time representations that can either include or lack leading zeros in months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds. 此圖說明範例。The example provides an illustration of this. 如果中的相符項目`formats`要求`input`包含日期而非時間，產生物件指派午夜的時間 (0: 00:00)。If the matched element in `formats` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果中的相符項目`formats`需要輸入包含時間但不是日期，產生物件會指派給本機系統上目前的日期。If the matched element in `formats` requires that input contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果中的相符項目`formats`不需要`input`包含位移時，所產生的位移的值取決於物件`styles`參數。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter. 如果`styles`包含，當地時區位移指派給物件。If `styles` includes , the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the object. 如果`styles`包含，Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 位移或 + 00:00，已指派給物件。If `styles` includes , the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the object. 如果指定兩個值，則會使用當地時區位移。If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used. 特定日期和時間的符號和中使用的字串`input`所定義`formatProvider`參數。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. 也是如此的模式比對的精確`input`如果的相符的項目`formats`是標準格式規範的字串。The same is true for the precise pattern of `input` if the matching element of `formats` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`參數可以是下列其中一項：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - A代表的文化特性的物件基礎所在`input`解譯。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 所傳回的物件屬性定義的符號和格式設定在`input`。The object returned by the property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`. - A定義格式的日期和時間資料的物件。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`已`null`，則使用對應至目前的文化特性的物件。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`參數可讓您定義是否允許泛空白字元在輸入字串中，指示如何剖析字串，而不需要明確的位移元件，並支援 UTC 轉換為剖析作業的一部分。The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is permitted in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation. 所有成員列舉型別支援除了。All members of the enumeration are supported except . 下表列出支援的每個成員的效果。The following table lists the effect of each supported member. |`DateTimeStyles` 成員`DateTimeStyles` member|行為Behavior| |-----------------------------|--------------| ||剖析`input`而且，如果有需要，將它轉換成 UTC。Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 它相當於剖析的字串，然後呼叫方法傳回的物件。It is equivalent to parsing a string, and then calling the method of the returned object.| ||如果中的相符項目`formats`不需要`input`包含位移的值，傳回的物件提供的當地時區位移。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the offset of the local time zone. 這是預設值。This is the default value.| ||如果中的相符項目`formats`不需要`input`包含位移的值，傳回的物件指定 UTC 時差 （+ 00:00）。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).| ||可讓`input`包含未指定中的項目內部的泛空白字元`formats`。Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by the elements in `formats`. 額外的空白字元可以出現日期和時間的元件之間，以及在個別的元件 （除了位移），並剖析字串時，會忽略。Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components (except for the offset) and is ignored when parsing the string.| ||可讓`input`包含前置空格中的項目未指定`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by the elements in `formats`. 剖析字串時，會忽略這些項目。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||可讓`input`包含後端中的項目未指定的空格`formats`。Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by the elements in `formats`. 剖析字串時，會忽略這些項目。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||可讓`input`包含前置、 尾端，與內部空間中的項目未指定`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by the elements in `formats`. 未指定相符的項目中的所有額外泛空白字元`formats`時剖析字串都會被忽略。All extra white-space characters not specified in the matched element in `formats` are ignored when parsing the string.| ||表示中不允許其他泛空白字元`input`。Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`. 空白字元必須出現在完全中特定項目中所指定`formats`成功比對會發生。White space must appear exactly as specified in a particular element in `formats` for a successful match to occur. 這是預設行為。This is the default behavior.| ||沒有任何作用，因為結構不包含`Kind`屬性。Has no effect because the structure does not include a `Kind` property.| ## Examples 下列範例會定義多個輸入的日期與時間和位移的值的字串表示格式，並接著會傳遞由使用者輸入的字串方法。The following example defines multiple input formats for the string representation of a date and time and offset value, and then passes the string that is entered by the user to the method. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact/cs/TryParseExact.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact/vb/TryParseExact.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得值，表示 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 日期和時間的目前物件。

span.span: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不會執行雙重轉換：The property performs a dual conversion: - 它會將轉換的日期和時間的目前物件為 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)。It converts the date and time of the current object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 藉由減去的值執行轉換屬性從目前的時間與日期物件。The conversion is performed by subtracting the value of the property from the date and time of the current object. - 它會將轉換值值。It converts the value to a value. 屬性傳回之值設定為。The property of the returned value is set to . 擷取的值屬性就相當於呼叫目前物件的`ToUniversalTime.DateTime`屬性，不同之處在於後者的屬性值是。Retrieving the value of the property is equivalent to calling the current object's `ToUniversalTime.DateTime` property, except that the property of the latter value is . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示值和其相對應的 UTC 時間。The following example shows how to use of the property to display a value and its corresponding UTC time. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/cs/Properties.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/vb/Properties.vb#17)]

summary.span: 取得物件的日期和時間設為目前 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 日期和時間，且其位移為。

span.span: Gets a object whose date and time are set to the current Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time and whose offset is .

value.span: 其日期和時間的物件是目前的 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)，而位移為。

span.span: An object whose date and time is the current Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and whose offset is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性計算目前全球定位時間 (UTC) 以本機系統的時鐘時間和定義的本機系統的時區位移。The property computes the current Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) based on the local system's clock time and an offset defined by the local system's time zone. 目前的 UTC 時間毫秒部分的有效位數，取決於系統時鐘的解析度。The precision of the current UTC time's millisecond component depends on the resolution of the system clock. 在 Windows NT 3.5 和更新版本和 Windows Vista 作業系統中，時鐘的解析度會是大約為 10-15 毫秒。On Windows NT 3.5 and later, and Windows Vista operating systems, the clock's resolution is approximately 10-15 milliseconds. ## Examples 下列範例說明 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 與當地時間之間的關聯性。The following example illustrates the relationship between Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and local time. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/cs/Properties.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/vb/Properties.vb#18)]

summary.span: 取得刻度數表示日期和時間的目前物件之 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)。

span.span: Gets the number of ticks that represents the date and time of the current object in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

value.span: 中的刻度數物件的 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)。

span.span: The number of ticks in the object's Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性表示 0001 年 1 月 1 日，12:00:00 午夜起已經過的 100 奈秒間隔數 (值)。The value of the property represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00:00 midnight on January 1, 0001 (the value of ). 它不包含刻度將會新增閏秒。It does not include ticks that would be added by leap seconds. 奈秒是一個十億分之一秒;第二個有 10 萬個刻度。A nanosecond is one billionth of a second; there are ten million ticks in a second. 值屬性的範圍是從`DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks`至`DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`。The value of the property ranges from `DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks` to `DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的值不會影響屬性屬性。The property is not affected by the value of the property. 您也可以建立的字串表示法藉由呼叫物件的年份元件方法使用"y"、"yy"或"yyyy"自訂格式規範。You can also create a string representation of a object's year component by calling the method with the "y", "yy", or "yyyy" custom format specifiers. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的年份元件四個不同的方式的值：The following example displays the year component of a value in four different ways: - 所擷取的值屬性。By retrieving the value of the property. - 藉由呼叫方法與"y"格式規範。By calling the method with the "y" format specifier. - 藉由呼叫方法使用"yy"格式規範。By calling the method with the "yy" format specifier. - 藉由呼叫方法與"yyyy"格式規範。By calling the method with the "yyyy" format specifier.
